com.bigdata.rawstore

Interface IStreamStore

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IAllocationManagerStore, IAtomicStore, IBufferStrategy, IDiskBasedStrategy, IHABufferStrategy, IHAJournal, IJournal, IMemoryManager, IRawStore, IRWStrategy, IStore
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBufferStrategy, AbstractJournal, AbstractRawStore, AbstractRawWormStore, AllocationContext, BasicBufferStrategy, DirectBufferStrategy, DiskBackedBufferStrategy, DiskOnlyStrategy, IndexSegmentStore, Journal, JournalDelegate, MappedBufferStrategy, MemoryManager, MemStore, MemStrategy, RawStoreDelegate, RWStore, RWStrategy, SimpleFileRawStore, SimpleMemoryRawStore, StoreManager.ManagedJournal, TemporaryRawStore, TemporaryStore, TransientBufferStrategy, WORMStrategy

    public interface IStreamStore
    Interface for reading and writing streams on a persistence store.
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson
    See Also:
    Support PSOutputStream/InputStream at IRawStore

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      InputStream getInputStream(long addr)
      Return an input stream from which a previously written stream may be read back.
      IPSOutputStream getOutputStream()
      Return an output stream which can be used to write on the backing store.

    • Method Detail

      • getOutputStream

        IPSOutputStream getOutputStream()
        Return an output stream which can be used to write on the backing store. You can recover the address used to read back the data from the IPSOutputStream.
        Returns:
        The output stream.

      • getInputStream

        InputStream getInputStream(long addr)
        Return an input stream from which a previously written stream may be read back.
        Parameters:
        addr - The address at which the stream was written.
        Returns:
        an input stream for the data for provided address
